messages.title: LABOUR ON BREXIT
messages.content: Put Jeremy Corbyn in charge of negotiations. No controls on immigration.

messages.title: THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ON BREXIT
messages.content: Reject the British people's EU referendum vote.

THERESA MAY NEEDS YOUR LOCAL VOTE Just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. So whoever is Prime Minister must be up to the job of getting the best Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lower taxes, lower bills and better-paid jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Many families struggle to cope with monthly bills. So Theresa May and the Conservatives will reduce income tax to help, extending the personal allowance to £12,500 per year.
Conservatives will increase school funding by £4 billion over the next five years, benefiting schools in every constituency.
Theresa May plans to strengthen the Social Care system and ensure nobody has to sell their home to pay for care.
Theresa May and the Conservatives will secure the best Brexit deal, reducing immigration, regaining control of borders, and increasing funding for services with money saved.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A LOSS OF JUST 6 SEATS AND THERESA MAY'S GOVERNMENT LOSES ITS MAJORITY – PUTTING BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS AT RISK

issues.brexitEurope: LABOUR ON BREXIT, THE SNP ON BREXIT, THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ON BREXIT, A LOSS OF JUST 6 SEATS AND THERESA MAY'S GOVERNMENT LOSES ITS MAJORITY – PUTTING BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS AT RISK, securing the best Brexit deal

quotes.text: SKY-HIGH immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn, the Labour leader signalled today.
LABOUR PLOTS BREXIT DEAL WITH OTHER PARTIES IF TORIES DON'T WIN ELECTION MAJORITY
